newsitem.title: USA: CSCE called to open unch in quiet overnight trade.
newsitem.headline: CSCE called to open unch in quiet overnight trade.

text.p: CSCE world sugar was called to open barely changed on lackluster trading overnight in London and technical trading in Friday's session.
LIFFE trading was limited to 11 lots by 0712 EDT/1112 GMT, but traders noted that the October price was holding support of $325.
On Friday, the CSCE October contract triggered fund sell stops at 11.57 cents a lb before rebounding late in the session.
Technical support is pegged at 11.55 cents in October, while resistance is pegged at 11.70 cents, sources said.
